scripts.bump: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const json = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf-8')); const new_json = {...json, version: json.version.split('.').map((el, i) => i==2 ? Number(el)+1 : el).join('.') } ;   fs.writeFileSync('package.json',  JSON.stringify(new_json, null, 4))"
